title: God Ends the Famine
summary: Elisha prophesies that the famine in Samaria will end. Four lepers discover the Syrian army has fled, leaving behind food and supplies. This news is shared with the king, fulfilling Elishaâ€™s prophecy. The officer who doubted Elisha dies, trampled in the rush to the food.

faq.question: How was the city saved from famine?
faq.answer: God caused the Syrians to flee, leaving their camp full of supplies.

faq.question: What happened to the officer who doubted Elisha?
faq.answer: He was trampled to death at the city gate.
